title: Grayscale Filter
description: Convert your images to grayscale with adjustable intensity

sections.title: About Grayscale Filter
content: Grayscale conversion removes color information while preserving luminance, creating classic black and white images.

sections.title: When to Use Grayscale
content: Print materials to save on color costs
Focus attention on composition and contrast

sections.title: Grayscale Conversion Formula
content: Weights based on human eye sensitivity to colors

sections.title: Technical Details
content: Maintains original image dimensions and quality
Compatible with all common image formats
